book.synopsis: This title presents an enthralling account of day-to-day life in a medieval French village. Using records gathered by the Catholic Church in its pursuit of heretics, the book recreates the lives of a rich cast of village characters.
book.title_long: Montaillou : Cathars and Catholics in a French Village, 1294-1324
